title: Havelock City 3 Bedroom Apartment For Sale - Elibank Tower
details:
Want to invest in one of the most luxurious condominium complexes in Sri Lanka?

The Apartment has 3 Bedrooms with all the needful furniture. Also has 3 Bathrooms (1 attached and 2 common). Plus this has a room for the maids and a bathroom as well. Apartment is very spacious as it has a floor area of 1500 square feet. And, the apartment is located on a higher floor with the sight of breathtaking views of the Developing City of Colombo.

Regardless of the above mentioned, The Havelock City premises include many facilities such as a magnificent swimming pool & gymnasium, Cafeteria, Also the entire premises is offered with 24/7 security.
And the upcoming 45-storied commercial complex will provide many more amenities within the premises itself!
